body:
**Is your feature request related to a problem? Please describe.**
Current activity retry behavior is hardcoded in server: heartbeat and start to close timeout is retryable. Other timeout types are not retryable. Some uses cases (e.g. go-sdk session creation activity) require only retrying certain types of errors but not timeout.

**Describe the solution you'd like**
We should allow customizing this behavior via the non-retryable errors field in activity retry policy. 

**Describe alternatives you've considered**
A clear and concise description of any alternative solutions or features you've considered.

**Additional context**
go-sdk issue: https://github.com/temporalio/sdk-go/issues/722
title: Allow customizing activity retry behavior for timeout errors
